name: novus-mail
description: NortixMail is a self-hosted webmail system designed to simplify email hosting for individuals or SMEs. It features inbox, filters, address book, and a responsive interface for communications.

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Access email through a clean, responsive web interface from any browser

features.title: Search and Filter

features.title: Email Filtering

features.title: Mobile Responsive
